titles.title: Waiving points or order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2215) to authorize appropriations for the Department of Justice for fiscal year 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-696, by Ms. Pryce (OH).
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read when called up for consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 219.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 552.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 208 - 199 (Roll no. 416).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/25/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2215 (FY 2002 Department of Justice authorization).
